document.full_text: the red sox hammered the yankees for 12 hits friday, seven off starter phil hughes, who retired 5 of the 14 batters he faced and has lacked velocity on his fastball.
document.title: red sox 9, yankees 6: red sox rough up hughes for first win
lines_and_colors: the red sox hammered the yankees for 12 hits friday, seven off starter phil hughes, who retired 5 of the 14 batters he faced and has lacked velocity on his fastball.
